title: literally no1 is playing aram or dark moon
body: please rotate the game modes or remove them from rotation id rather 3v3 and something fun for the rotation. its a real piss off vsing bots in both aram and co-op vs ai.

replies.body:
LMAO, thousands of people play ARAM every day on OCE.

I could play 10 games in a row and not see the same player twice.

Put down the crackpipe and take off your tinfoil hat.


You see bots in ARAM because you have low ARAM MMR. I haven't seen an ARAM bot in weeks.

[edit] Oh,  you're level 24. Get above 30 and win some games and the bots will disappear.
